entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hornepayne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:28 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nagagami 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -29.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -33.0°C
Wind: WSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
